content: the tidal bloom pillow was inspired by a tender moment in the sea glass journal between tess and her son miles a marine biologist whose fascination with sharks mirrors his adventurous spirit throughout his life tess reminded him to jump at the right waves a lesson about courage timing and trusting life s flow i wanted to design something that quietly honors that connection a piece that evokes the sea without being literal the result is this elegant coastal-inspired pillow worked in soft gray tones reminiscent of ocean depths with a swirling surface-crochet flower that blooms like a tide in motion the tidal bloom pillow captures both strength and serenity a reminder that chasing your dreams like the movement of the sea can be both powerful and peaceful whether it rests on your couch bed or favorite reading chair it brings a touch of ocean calm and heartfelt meaning to any space watch the step-by-step video tutorial below to crochet along with me
